content: No doubt Jurvetson is a swell guy and all that, but let’s not forget that the economic survival of this growing army of professional VC “clairvoyants”, also depends on the regular sale and construction of the “next big thing”— preferably with cool, sci-fi sounding names like Molecular Manufacturing and Directed Evolution, and the more ‘conceptual’ (yet ambitious), the better. And also like any good salesman, there’s never any ‘downside’.
